text:
A BJP MLA in Rajasthan has stoked fresh controversy by alleging that Jawaharlal Nehru University is a hub of sex and drugs where over 3,000 used condoms and 2,000 liquor bottles are daily found.

Gyandev Ahuja, MLA for Ramgarh in Alwar district, alleged that those studying in JNU were indulging in all these “illicit” activities.

“More than 10,000 butts of cigarettes and 4,000 pieces of beedis are found daily on the JNU campus … 50,000 big and small pieces of bones are left by those eating non-vegetarian food. They gorge on meat ... these anti-nationals; 2,000 wrappers of chips and namkeen are found, as also 3,000 used condoms — the misdeeds they commit with our sisters and daughters there. And 500 used contraceptive injections are also found.”

Besides this, 2,000 liquor bottles as also over 3,000 beer cans and bottles are daily detected in the campus, he claimed. “Who drinks it? Take a guess,” he said. — PTI
title: A den of immoral activities: BJP MLA
